feed.title: ChangeDetection Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.16 Python pip build small release
entry.content:
0.45.16 Python pip build small release - fixes missing files in pip distribution

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.15...0.45.16

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updating pyppeteer-ng (mainly newer pillow release to solve Windows install problems) by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2247
  • Update contributing documentation for discontinuation of dev branch by @AndrewKvalheim in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2272
  • UI Updates
  • mqtt:// and apprise notification updates

New Contributors

  • @AndrewKvalheim made their first contribution in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2272

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.16...0.45.17

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.18
entry.content:
Minor maintenance release

What's Changed

  • Re #2263 "send test notification" from watch edit should respect global settings and tag/group settings by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2289
  • Tweaks to tag/groups page by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2290
  • Remove unique check for URLs entered on the "quick watch add" form #2286 by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2292
  • avoid deprecated message - packing our own strtobool by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2291
  • UI - Re #2307 - Adding UI notice if watch has group options set by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2311

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.17...0.45.18

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.19 - Single fix for OS's with a newer `lxml` installed
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • module 'lxml.etree' has no attribute '_ElementStringResult' - reimplement _ElementStringResult by @dgtlmoon in https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/pull/2313

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dgtlmoon/changedetection.io/compare/0.45.18...0.45.19

entry.title: New release for ChangeDetection: 0.45.20 single fix - LXML filter library improvements
entry.content:
